title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.215 - Alcohol concentration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.215 - Alcohol concentration

State Regulations

Each operator shall prohibit a covered employee from
reporting for duty or remaining on duty requiring the performance of covered
functions while having an alcohol concentration of 0.04 or greater. No operator
having actual knowledge that a covered employee has an alcohol concentration of
0.04 or greater shall permit the employee to perform or continue to perform
covered functions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
262.215

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
